documentation.text:
@title BlacklistValidator
 @dev Implements a validator which rejects transfers to blacklisted addresses.

@dev Emitted when an address is added to the blacklist.
 @param adversary Address added.

@dev Emitted when an address is removed from the blacklist.
 @param friend Address removed.

@dev Adds an address to the blacklist.
 @param adversary Address to add.

@dev Removes an address from the blacklist.
 @param friend Address to remove.

@dev Validates token transfer.
 Implements IValidator interface.

@dev Explicit override of transferOwnership from Claimable and Ownable
 @param newOwner Address to transfer ownership to.

@title BlacklistValidator
 @dev Implements a validator which rejects transfers to blacklisted addresses.

@dev Emitted when an address is added to the blacklist.
 @param adversary Address added.

@dev Emitted when an address is removed from the blacklist.
 @param friend Address removed.

@dev Adds an address to the blacklist.
 @param adversary Address to add.

@dev Removes an address from the blacklist.
 @param friend Address to remove.

@dev Validates token transfer.
 Implements IValidator interface.

@dev Explicit override of transferOwnership from Claimable and Ownable
 @param newOwner Address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.details: Implements a validator which rejects transfers to blacklisted addresses.

Ban(address).details: Emitted when an address is added to the blacklist.

Unban(address).details: Emitted when an address is removed from the blacklist.

ban(address).details: Adds an address to the blacklist.

claimOwnership().details: Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.

params._contractAddr: The address of the Ownable to be reclaimed.

reclaimEther().details: Transfer all Ether held by the contract to the owner.

params._token: ERC20Basic The address of the token contract

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

params._data: Bytes The data passed from the caller.
params._from: address The address that is transferring the tokens
params._value: uint256 the amount of the specified token

transferOwnership(address).details: Explicit override of transferOwnership from Claimable and Ownable

unban(address).details: Removes an address from the blacklist.

validate(address,address,uint256).details: Validates token transfer. Implements IValidator interface.

devdoc.title: BlacklistValidator

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
